Australia:
 1. Australia is one of the most is developed country.
 2. Area is 7.692 million km2 and population is 24.6 million
 3. GDP(Gross domestic product) is 1.323 trillion USD
 4. Per capita income is 45,780 PPP dollars
 5. The main followed religion is Christianity.
 6. Literacy rate is 99%.
 7. Main language is English.But also Mandarin is practiced.
 8. Capital is Canberra.
 9. The Australian Dollar is the currency of Australia. 1 Australian Dollar equals
 0.71 United States Dollar.

10. Dialing code/Calling code is +61.

11. Crime rate has decreased upto 10% in 2017-18.

Bangladesh:
 1. Bangladesh is a developing country.
 2. Area is 147,570km2 and population is 164.7 million
 3. GDP(Gross domestic product) is 249.7 billion USD
 4. Per capita income is 4,040 PPP dollars
 5. The main followed religion is Islam.But there is also practice of Hinduism.
 6. Literacy rate is 72.89%.
 7. Main language is Bengali.But also English is practiced.
 8. Capital is Dhaka.
 9. The Bangladeshi Taka is the currency of Bangladesh(BDT). 1 Bangladeshi Taka equals
 0.012 United States Dollar.

10. Dialing code/Calling code is +880.

11. Crime rate is 71.98.

Canada:
 1. Canada is a developed country.
 2. Area is 9.985 million km2 and population is 37.06 million
 3. GDP(Gross domestic product) is 1.653 trillion USD
 4. Per capita income is 45,750 PPP dollars
 5. The main followed religion is Christianity.
 6. Literacy rate is 99%.
 7. Main language is English.But also French is practiced.
 8. Capital is Ottawa.
 9. The Canadian Dollar is the currency of Canada. 1 Canadian Dollar equals
 0.75 United States Dollar.

10. Dialing code/Calling code is +1.

11. Crime rate has decreased upto 30% in 2017-18.

Denmark:
 1. Denmark is considered to be one of the most economically and socially developed countries in the world.
 2. Area is 42,933 km2 and population is 5.749 million
 3. GDP(Gross domestic product) is 324.9 billion USD
 4. Per capita income is 51, 560 PPP dollars
 5. The main followed religion is Christianity.
 6. Literacy rate is 99%.
 7. Main language is Danish.But also English is practiced.
 8. Capital is Copenhagen.
 9. The Danish krone is the currency of Denmark(DKK). 1 Danish krone equals
 0.15 United States Dollar.

10. Dialing code/Calling code is +45.

11. In 2012, Denmark had a murder rate of 0.8 per 100,000 population.

Egypt:
 1. Egypt is one of the most developed countries in the Africa.
 2. Area 1.01 million is km2 and population is 97.55 million
 3. GDP(Gross domestic product) is 235.4 billion USD
 4. Per capita income is 11, 360 PPP dollars
 5. The main followed religion is Islam.But Christianity is also practiced.
 6. Literacy rate is 75.84%.
 7. Main language is Arabic.But also English is practiced.
 8. Capital is Caira.
 9. The Egyptian Pound is the currency of Egypt. 1 Egyptian Pound equals
 0.058 United States Dollar.

10. Dialing code/Calling code is +20.

11. Crime rate is 50.48(Moderate).

India:

1. India is a developing country.
 2. Area is 3.287 million km2 and population is 1.339 billion
 3. GDP(Gross domestic product) is 2.597 trillion USD
 4. Per capita income is 7,060 PPP dollars
 5. The main followed religion is Hinduism.But there is also practice of Islam,Christianity,Sikhism, Buddhism, Jainism etc.
 6. Literacy rate is 74.04%.
 7. Main language is Hindi.But also Gujarati,Hindustani,Bengali,Punjabi,Urdu,Sindhi,Telugu,Kannda,Sanskrit,Tamil,Malayalam,Maithili,English is practiced.
 8. Capital is New Delhi.
 9. The Indian Rupee is the currency of India(INR). 1 Rupee equals
 0.014 United States Dollar.

10. Dialing code/Calling code is +91.

11. India has many states.The highest crime rate is in Delhi which is 974.9(per 100,000 person).

Malaysia:

1. Malaysis is a developing country.
 2. Area is 330,803 km2 and population is 31.62 million
 3. GDP(Gross domestic product) is 314.5 billion USD
 4. Per capita income is 28,650 PPP dollars
 5. The main followed religion is Islam.But there is also practice of Christianity,Hinduism, Buddhism etc.
 6. Literacy rate is 93.12%.
 7. Main language is Malay.But also English is practiced.
 8. Capital is Kuala Lampur.
 9. The Malaysian ringgit is the currency of Malaysia. 1 Malaysian ringgit equals
 0.24 United States Dollar.

10. Dialing code/Calling code is +60.

11. Malaysia has a crime rate of 63.33(High).

New Nealand:

1. New Zealand is a developed country.
 2. Area is 268,021 km2 and population is 4.794 million
 3. GDP(Gross domestic product) is 205.9 billion USD
 4. Per capita income is 39,560 PPP dollars
 5. The main followed religion is Christianity.
 6. Literacy rate is around 99%.
 7. Main language is English.But also Maori is practiced.
 8. Capital is Wellington.
 9. The New Zealand dollar is the currency of New Zealand. 1 New Zealand dollar equals
 0.68 United States Dollar.

10. Dialing code/Calling code is +64.

11. New Zealand has a crime rate of around 41%.

Qatar:

1. Qatar is a developing country.
 2. Area is 11,571 km2 and population is 2.639 million
 3. GDP(Gross domestic product) is 167.6 billion USD
 4. Per capita income is 128,060 PPP dollars
 5. The main followed religion is Islam.
 6. Literacy rate is around 97.75%.
 7. Main language is Arabic.But also English is practiced.
 8. Capital is Doha.
 9. The Qatari riyal is the currency of Qatar. 1 Qatari riyal equals
 0.27 United States Dollar.

10. Dialing code/Calling code is +974.

11. Qatar has a low crime rate.

Srilanka:
 1. Srilanka is a developing country but it is expected to be the 1st developed country in south asia.
 2. Area is 65,610km2 and population is 21.44 million
 3. GDP(Gross domestic product) is 87.17 billion USD
 4. Per capita income is 12,470 PPP dollars
 5. The main followed religion is Theravada Buddhism.But there is also practice of Hinduism,Christianity and Islam.
 6. Literacy rate is 92%.
 7. Main language is Sinhala.But also Tamil and English is practiced.
 8. Capital is Colombo.
 9. The Srilankan Rupee is the currency of Srilanka(LKR). 1 Rupee equals
 0.0056 United States Dollar.

10. Dialing code/Calling code is +94.

11. Crime rate is 40.54.
